A magical transformation chamber where the frog can select from various costumes and accessories to transform into a prince.
A fairy godmother-style transformation scene where the frog is surrounded by sparkles and glitter as it morphs into a prince.
A futuristic transformation pod where the frog is enveloped in a shimmering energy field and transformed into a sleek, high-tech prince.
A fantastical forest where the frog is transformed by a magical tree that grants wishes.
A time-traveling portal where the frog is transported to a different era, transforming it into a prince of the past or future.
